items.sentence: She was determined never to talk to him again.
She was the first one to pay attention to him.
She went to see him in the hospital every day.
I just told Tom what time he needs to be here.
I just want to know what you did this morning.
I kept a diary in French when I was a student.
I\'m pretty sure Tom won\'t do anything crazy.
One of Tom\'s children lives in Australia now.
There are many people who don\'t speak French.
I thought Tom was going to tell me what to do.
